page.title: 14FARMING (Cont)
page.content: Clint Hill Farm-Dairy farm with the farm house in Hanging Houghton. Animals-100 Cattle 4 Goats Machinery-7 Tractors 1 Combine Harvester 1 Baler 1 Sprayer 1 Fertiliser Sprayer 1 Seed Drill People-3 men work on the farm Crops-A lot of the farm is pasture but they grow wheat and rape and some silage. There is a fox covert on top of Clint Hill. Manor Farm-Mixed arable. Crops-Wheat,barley rape potatoes. One of several farms owned by same man. Farm workers and machinery are employed on other farms not in our D Block
